list.text: I won't waste my precious time for the sake of your personal amusement.

list.description: [legacy] calculates time since we've got the last Viktor skin

list.refusal: You have been given an opportunity to ask me, an evolved being, for anything; and you ask for a cat photo. _Really_?

list.refusal: You're an adult, decide for yourself.
